name: High School Friends
preparation:
This drink a tart and boozy riff on a Whiskey Sour. The sweet-sourness of Mike’s Hard Lemonade plus the alcoholic bite of Jim Beam bourbon is heaven in a cup.

Fill a Julep cup with crushed ice, add the bourbon, and stir for 30 seconds.

Add the Mike’s Hard Lemonade, and top off with more crushed ice.
